Of Chaldee origin; son of Nabas; Barnabas, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; properly, to lead; by implication, to bring, drive, go, pass, or induce.

From apostello; a delegate; specially, an ambassador of the Gospel; officially a commissioner of Christ.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To relate in full, describe, narrate. From dia and hegeomai; to relate fully.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

str2: To speak freely, boldly; To be confident.
